Reference

Functions

Useful functions beyond scope of simulation study

cuminc_weib()

Compute true cumulative incidence for one of two competing events

rweibull_KM()

Sample from Weibull distirbution in K&M parametrisation.

nelsaalen_timefixed()

Compute Nelson Aalen estimate for simulated data

choose_standard_refpat()

Choose standard reference patient to predict

make_mstate_refpat()

Prepare reference patient to predict with probtrans

pool_morisot()

Pooling probabilities based on complementary log-log transformation

ggplot_nlp()

Custom ggplot-based nested loop plots

Datasets

Summarised simulation data and synthetic version of applied dataset

dat_mds_synth

Synthetic version of MDS long-term data

mds_shape_rates

Estimated baseline hazard parameters from MDS data

preds_results

Summarised simulation results - predictions

regr_results

Summarised simulation results - regression coefficients

scenarios

Scenarios table for simulation study
